event.descr:
This notification is generated whenever Application Server detects that it is not able to connect to DataBase inorder to get configuration information. The object asTrapInfoString gives the detailed description of the error occured.

asTrapSeverity %parm[#1]%;

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

asTrapInfoString %parm[#2]%;

This notification is generated whenever Application Server detects that it is not able to connect to DataBase inorder to get configuration information. The object asTrapInfoString gives the detailed description of the error occured.

asTrapSeverity %parm[#1]%;

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

asTrapInfoString %parm[#2]%;

This notification is generated whenever the Wrapper program in application server detects a Critical error. asTrapInfoString gives the detailed description of the error.

asTrapSeverity %parm[#1]%;

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

asTrapInfoString %parm[#2]%;

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

asTrapInfoString %parm[#2]%;

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

asTrapInfoString %parm[#2]%;

asTrapInfoString %parm[#2]%;

This notification is generated whenever the framework detects that the load for the current interval exceeds the threshold value fcOverloadThreshold1.

asTrapSeverity %parm[#1]%;

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

fcOverloadThreshold1 %parm[#2]%;

fcCurrentLoad %parm[#3]%;

asTrapInfoString %parm[#4]%;
event.logmsg: asOverloadThreshold1Exceed trap received asTrapSeverity=%parm[#1]% fcOverloadThreshold1=%parm[#2]% fcCurrentLoad=%parm[#3]% asTrapInfoString=%parm[#4]%

event.descr:
This notification is generated by Application Server while monitoring the disk space and finds disk space is less. asTrapInfoString gives the detail description of the disk path and freespace left etc.,

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

asTrapInfoString %parm[#2]%;

This notification is sent when the application server finds an user's password is going to expire. This is a minor trap. asTrapInfoString gives the user name and in howmany days the password expires.

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

Notification that indicates the Application Server finds an error with the application. An example would be the Application Server is not able to initialize the configured application. The object asTrapInfoString gives the detailed description of the error occured.

This notification is generated by UM Application whenever it detects that it is not getting response from the servers it is using. These servers include LDAP Server Mail Server TTS Resource Manager Network Access Storage (NAS) and so forth. Object umTrapDescr object gives the description of the notification.

asTrapSeverity %parm[#1]%;

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

umTrapDescr %parm[#2]%;

This notification is generated by UM Application whenever it detects that it is not getting response from the servers it is using. These servers include LDAP Server Mail Server TTS Resource Manager Network Access Storage (NAS) and so forth. Object umTrapDescr object gives the description of the notification.

asTrapSeverity %parm[#1]%;

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

umTrapDescr %parm[#2]%;

This notification is generated by UM Application whenever it encounters a major exception. Object umTrapDescr object gives the detail description of the actual notification.

asTrapSeverity %parm[#1]%;

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

umTrapDescr %parm[#2]%;

This notification is generated by UM Application whenever it encounters a major exception. Object umTrapDescr object gives the detail description of the actual notification.

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

umTrapDescr %parm[#2]%;

This notification indicates that the state of asProcessName is changed to asProcessState.

asTrapSeverity %parm[#1]%;

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

asProcessName %parm[#2]%;

asProcessState %parm[#3]%;

running(1) stopped(2) restarted(3) unableToRestart(4) notResponding(5)
event.logmsg: asProcessStateChange trap received asTrapSeverity=%parm[#1]% asProcessName=%parm[#2]% asProcessState=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
This notification indicates that the state of asProcessName is changed to asProcessState.

asTrapSeverity %parm[#1]%;

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

asProcessName %parm[#2]%;

asProcessState %parm[#3]%;

running(1) stopped(2) restarted(3) unableToRestart(4) notResponding(5)
event.logmsg: asProcessStateChange trap received asTrapSeverity=%parm[#1]% asProcessName=%parm[#2]% asProcessState=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
This notification indicates that the Process Manager on the Application Server is down. Please check the logs for more information.

asTrapSeverity %parm[#1]%;

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

asTrapInfoString %parm[#2]%;

This notification indicates that the Process Manager on the Application Server is down. Please check the logs for more information.

asTrapSeverity %parm[#1]%;

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

asTrapInfoString %parm[#2]%;

This notification indicates that Cron Tasks on the Application server encountered an error while executing. Please check the logs for more information.

asTrapSeverity %parm[#1]%;

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

asTrapInfoString %parm[#2]%;

This notification is generated whenever Application Server detects that the number of calls that are currenlty in progress are crossed the licensed hard limit. The object asTrapInfoString gives the detailed description of the error occured.

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

asTrapInfoString %parm[#2]%;

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

asTrapInfoString %parm[#2]%;

clear(1) informational(2) warning(3) minor(4) major(5) critical(6)

asTrapInfoString %parm[#2]%;
